'Geeshie Wiley' (sometimes rendered as 'Geechie Wiley') was an American female
blues singer and guitar player. She recorded three records in the early 1930s.
There are no known photographs or images of the artist in existence. [http://sundayblues.org/archives/tag/geeshie-
wiley Sundayblues.org - accessed January 2010]
